description: It's nice to see what reports have been sent back to the mothership and can be handy for reviewing past issues to see if there's a pattern with something. It is fairly simplistic, but I guess that's all you need.
It keeps crashing and causing problems.
It analyses each crash forever
Horrible application, tbh.
summary: The problem reporting software itself crashes

description:
Guys! I just want to hit "report" and a while later received "Finished". I don't want to type my email and password every time, I don't know why things crash or what I was doing, I don't remember my passsword because I only use it for this, I have to check it every time. 
Remove all this stuff, just ione click to report. Please.

The UI is very basic but that's a good thing as this software could have been developed with power users only in mind. but it wasn't and for that I am able to explain complex errors in a simple way to my clients and extended family. Great work.
That small bug block me on any my step. Cant download ad install any of linux os. Plz help me. That broke all of my linux here at home. 3C7C3FE71108 Mac of router
This app is made to report, and it has been doing so to make Fedora better
I'm glad to help with bug reports!

After auto reporting bugs it keeps reporting them until you open the app and clean up reports. this is very taxing if the error it is reporting are known about and an unfixed part of you system as to run some things you need a tainted kernel and is not a failure just an app crashing. Like firefox and chrome as you forced use all back to software render, if you force it back to hardware it crashes a lot, also for use of AV1 decoder I needed to use Intel latest drivers on my iGPU after all I pick intel as it had better iGPU's for video playback, but intel drivers crash and Gstreamer still force software render for some reason. it is like Fedora has gone out of their way to GIMP iGPU's, buy removing hardware support codec's and driver part needed even on Free codec's like AV1. So as this often report tainted kernel or app crashes as AV1 seem to crash sometimes as does most third party proprietary drivers. or simple error, this app build up fast and then keep contacting when you doing other thing and using up power just like Microsoft update run in background and suck juice. Seriously my system was lagging so look at system monitor and it was using 70% of CPU, I have a modern 12th gen, and 32GB ram, so that's a lot for a background task so I nuked it. Back down to using 0% cpu while watching 4K+8K youtube in VP9 or AV1.
Whem start data analisys step, the app is slower tham expected and not show progress value, just confused dots

I should not have to sign up for my distro's bug tracker in order to submit a report. IDK if that is the problem reporting app's fault or fedora's fault but it's pretty dumb. And you learn this after waiting 20 minutes for a backtrace to generate.
summary: Why does this require me to have an API key to submit a report?

description: Not bad for free but not for a new users.
no thanks.......
The app is a gui for fedora abrt, which is really great an monitors your system to catch any error, and gather all the info, the gui allows to send those to the bug tracker, which is also great.
summary: Other distros lack such good apps

description: I've deleted all messages, yet I still see notifications on my login screen. Can't find any open problems in terminal either. It's nice to see an easy way to report problems, but not being able to delete notifications is just frustrating as it wont tell when anything new appears.
summary: Easy to report, hard to end notifications

description: Ich habe das Programm getestet und leider ist keine Fenster aufgegangen, bei dem ich einen Bericht oder ähnliches gesehen habe.
A désinstaller en attendant des améliorations, signaller un problème devrais être beaucoup plus simple, moins de boite dialogue de confirmation, pas de connexion necessaire, plus rapide.
summary: Qu'il est difficile de rapporter un problème sur Gnome..

description: Чего только не сделаешь для родной Fedora...

Крутое решение для обратной связи. Ведь не всегда хочется искать логи, искать куда можно отправить отчет об ошибке, а если там ещё и регаться надо будет - уууу...
Сейчас хоть так можно помогать разработке программ для линуха)

Хорошее решение! Если вдруг будет какой-нибудь баг, пошлю его его разработчикам. Единственное, что сейчас достает - это Центр Приложений. Как-то через раз он работает. Но, судя по этому приложению об ошибках, пока никаких ошибок не выявлено. Так что поверим на слово.

Я готов был тратить своё время на отправку информации о сбоях, сейчас нахожусь в Донецке и сервер трассировки стал недоступен, если для вас принципиально кто сообщаяет об ошибках в ПО, ради бога, удаляю приложение.
